attributes.action: For Theresa May to resign as PM and a General Election to be held.
attributes.background: Theresa May refuses to interact with the devolved Governments of the U.K. In the Brexit process shows she is only interested in her and her party's own agenda. This by a PM that was not duly elected by the people of the U.K. A General Election should of be had with the resignation of the former PM.

rejection.details:
Any decision on whether to resign would be for the Prime Minister to take, not the Government or the House of Commons as a whole. 

You may wish to sign the following petition: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/180504
